detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract RaisableErc20 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EMTC__1.sol#223-277) has payable functions:
	 - RaisableErc20.addLiquidity() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EMTC__1.sol#267-276)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether or the call value is 0
